General.Name: Innovative Medical Management Co Ltd
General.Description: Innovative Medical Management Co.,Ltd. engages in the medical services business in China. The company owns and operates Jianhua Hospital, Kanghua Hospital, Futian Hospital, and Mingzhu Hospital. Its medical services include outpatient, inpatient, and medical examination. The company was formerly known as Qianzu Pearl Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Innovative Medical Management Co.,Ltd. in June 2016. Innovative Medical Management Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Zhuji, China.
